title: Malzahar Snow Day skin bug
body: I noticed when I was porting back that the voidling on the Snow Day skin is completely in blue as in it has no texture. I know its not a game breaking bug, but its still a skin glitch. I've tried other skins just to be sure and it seems to be only Snow Day that has the issue. Anyone else run into this?

replies.body:
Hey Asteriek! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
Thanks...I know its not a super important bug but still. Keep up the good work!
